gid.description: Unique identifier of the user associated with the event

name.description: Name of the user associated with the event

gid.description: Unique identifier of the resource associated with the event

resource_type.description: Type of the resource associated with the event

name.description: Name of the resource associated with the event

type.description: The type of event that occurred

action.description: The action taken in the event, such as create, update, or delete.

parent.description: Parent entity related to the event

gid.description: Unique identifier of the parent resource

created_at.description: The timestamp when the event was created

change.description: Details of the changes made in the event

action.description: The specific action within the change.

new_value.description: The new value after the change

gid.description: Unique identifier for the new value

resource_type.description: Type of the new value resource

added_value.description: Value that was added during the change

gid.description: Unique identifier for the added value

resource_type.description: Type of the added value resource

removed_value.description: Value that was removed during the change

gid.description: Unique identifier for the removed value

resource_type.description: Type of the removed value resource
